--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Firedrill and Beachcomber stay sitting in the hallway near the Cr
chambers,
> waiting for their last comrade to emerge. "Soo, what do we do next?"
> inquires Beachcomber in a calm voice. "I don't know, I would suggest
goin
> out on our own, but we would be totally outnumbered. Unfortunately,
most of
> the Maximals I have met so far have not given me a great feeling
about
> their cause". Then the CR chamber opens, and Beachcomber and
Firedrill jump
> to their feet to meet their long time partner.
> 
> The small red robot swaggers out off the chamber, "ohhhhh my akin
head" he
> musters. "Cliffjumper, your alive" blurts out Firedrill in
happiness, but
> realises now that all of his partners are up, that they need to do
> something. "Come on Cliffjumper, Beachcomber, it's time for us to
take
> charge". They then start heading off in a random direction, since
they dont
> know their whareabouts. They lucky pass by the control room Iron
Raptor is
> in.
